001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.ListUiElement;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
009import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.List;
012import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
013import org.openqa.selenium.By;
014
015import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
016
017/**
018 * Fluent service for interacting with list UI elements.
019 *
020 * <p>Provides methods for selecting, validating, and interacting with lists in a structured manner.
021 *
022 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends {@link UiServiceFluent},
023 * allowing method chaining for seamless interaction.
024 *
025 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
026 */
027@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
028public class ListServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> implements Insertion {
029
030   private static final String VALIDATING_SELECTED_ITEMS = "Validating Selected Items";
031   private final ItemListService itemListService;
032   private final T uiServiceFluent;
033   private final Storage storage;
034   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
035
036   /**
037    * Constructs a new ListServiceFluent instance.
038    *
039    * @param uiServiceFluent The UI service fluent instance.
040    * @param storage         The storage instance for UI states.
041    * @param itemListService The list service for interacting with UI elements.
042    * @param webDriver       The smart web driver instance.
043    */
044   public ListServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, ItemListService itemListService,
045                            SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
046      this.itemListService = itemListService;
047      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
048      this.storage = storage;
049      driver = webDriver;
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Selects items from the list.
054    *
055    * @param element The list UI element.
056    * @param values  The values to select.
057    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
058    */
059   public T select(final ListUiElement element, final String... values) {
060      Allure.step("[UI - List] [UI - List] Select values from list: " + Arrays.toString(values));
061      element.before().accept(driver);
062      itemListService.select(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
063      element.after().accept(driver);
064      return uiServiceFluent;
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Deselects items from the list.
069    *
070    * @param element The list UI element.
071    * @param values  The values to deselect.
072    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
073    */
074   public T deSelect(final ListUiElement element, final String... values) {
075      Allure.step("[UI - List] Deselect values from list: " + Arrays.toString(values));
076      element.before().accept(driver);
077      itemListService.deSelect(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
078      element.after().accept(driver);
079      return uiServiceFluent;
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Checks if the given values are selected in the list.
084    *
085    * @param element The list UI element.
086    * @param values  The values to check.
087    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
088    */
089   public T areSelected(final ListUiElement element, final String... values) {
090      Allure.step(
091            "[UI - List] Check if values are selected in the list: " + Arrays.toString(values));
092      element.before().accept(driver);
093      boolean selected = itemListService.areSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
094      element.after().accept(driver);
095      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
096      return uiServiceFluent;
097   }
098
099   /**
100    * Validates that the given values are selected in the list.
101    *
102    * @param element The list UI element.
103    * @param values  The expected selected values.
104    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
105    */
106   public T validateAreSelected(final ListUiElement element, final String... values) {
107      Allure.step(
108            "[UI - List] Validate if values are selected in the list: " + Arrays.toString(values));
109      return validateAreSelected(element, true, false, values);
110   }
111
112   /**
113    * Validates that the specified values are selected in the given list element.
114    *
115    * @param element The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
116    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
117    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
118    * @param values  The expected values that should be selected in the list.
119    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
120    */
121   public T validateAreSelected(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
122      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate if values are selected (soft: " + soft + "): "
123            + Arrays.toString(values));
124      return validateAreSelected(element, true, soft, values);
125   }
126
127   private T validateAreSelected(final ListUiElement element, boolean shouldBeSelected, boolean soft,
128                                 final String... values) {
129      element.before().accept(driver);
130      boolean selected = itemListService.areSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
131      element.after().accept(driver);
132      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
133
134      String assertionMessage = shouldBeSelected
135            ? "Validating list items are selected"
136            : "Validating list items are not selected";
137
138      if (soft) {
139         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
140               softAssertions -> {
141                  if (shouldBeSelected) {
142                     softAssertions.assertThat(selected).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
143                  } else {
144                     softAssertions.assertThat(selected).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
145                  }
146               }
147         );
148      } else {
149         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
150               () -> {
151                  if (shouldBeSelected) {
152                     Assertions.assertThat(selected).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
153                  } else {
154                     Assertions.assertThat(selected).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
155                  }
156               }
157         );
158      }
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Validates that the given values are not selected in the list.
163    *
164    * @param element The list UI element.
165    * @param values  The expected unselected values.
166    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
167    */
168   public T validateAreNotSelected(final ListUiElement element, final String... values) {
169      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate if values are not selected in the list: "
170            + Arrays.toString(values));
171      return validateAreSelected(element, false, false, values);
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Validates that the specified values are not selected in the given list element.
176    *
177    * @param element The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
178    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
179    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
180    * @param values  The values that should not be selected in the list.
181    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
182    */
183   public T validateAreNotSelected(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
184      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate if values are not selected (soft: " + soft + "): "
185            + Arrays.toString(values));
186      return validateAreSelected(element, false, soft, values);
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Checks if the specified value is selected in the given list element.
191    *
192    * @param element The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
193    * @param value   The value to check for selection.
194    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
195    */
196   public T isSelected(final ListUiElement element, final String value) {
197      Allure.step("[UI - List] Check if value is selected in the list: " + value);
198      element.before().accept(driver);
199      boolean selected = itemListService.isSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
200      element.after().accept(driver);
201      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
202      return uiServiceFluent;
203   }
204

206    * Validates that the specified value is selected in the given list element.

210    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
211    */
212   public T validateIsSelected(final ListUiElement element, final String value) {
213      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate if value is selected in the list: " + value);
214      return validateAreSelected(element, true, false, value);
215   }

287   /**
288    * Validates that the specified values in the given list element are enabled.
289    *
290    * @param element The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
291    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
292    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
293    * @param values  The values that should be enabled.
294    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
295    */
296   public T validateAreEnabled(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
297      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate if values are enabled (soft: " + soft + "): "
298            + Arrays.toString(values));
299      return validateAreEnabled(element, true, soft, values);
300   }
301
302   private T validateAreEnabled(final ListUiElement element, boolean shouldBeEnabled, boolean soft,
303                                final String... values) {
304      element.before().accept(driver);
305      boolean enabled = itemListService.areEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
306      element.after().accept(driver);
307      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
308
309      String assertionMessage = shouldBeEnabled
310            ? "Validating list items are enabled"
311            : "Validating list items are disabled";
312
313      if (soft) {
314         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
315               softAssertions -> {
316                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
317                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
318                  } else {
319                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
320                  }
321               }
322         );
323      } else {
324         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
325               () -> {
326                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
327                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
328                  } else {
329                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
330                  }
331               }
332         );
333      }
334   }

460   /**
461    * Validates that the specified values in the given list element are visible.
462    *
463    * @param element The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
464    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
465    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
466    * @param values  The specific values that should be visible.
467    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
468    */
469   public T validateAreVisible(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
470      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that the specified values are visible in the list");
471      return validateAreVisible(element, true, soft, values);
472   }
473
474   private T validateAreVisible(final ListUiElement element, boolean shouldBeVisible, boolean soft,
475                                final String... values) {
476      element.before().accept(driver);
477      boolean visible = itemListService.areVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
478      element.after().accept(driver);
479      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
480
481      String assertionMessage = shouldBeVisible
482            ? "Validating list items are visible"
483            : "Validating list items are hidden";
484
485      if (soft) {
486         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
487               softAssertions -> {
488                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
489                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
490                  } else {
491                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
492                  }
493               }
494         );
495      } else {
496         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
497               () -> {
498                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
499                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
500                  } else {
501                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
502                  }
503               }
504         );
505      }
506   }

602
603   /**
604    * Retrieves the selected items from the list.
605    *
606    * @param element The list UI element.
607    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
608    */
609   public T getSelected(final ListUiElement element) {
610      Allure.step("[UI - List] Retrieve selected items from the list");
611      element.before().accept(driver);
612      List<String> selectedItems = itemListService.getSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
613      element.after().accept(driver);
614      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selectedItems);
615      return uiServiceFluent;
616   }
617
618   /**
619    * Validates that the specified items are selected within the given list UI element.
620    *
621    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
622    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be selected.
623    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
624    */
625   public T validateSelectedItems(final ListUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
626      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that the specified items are selected");
627      return validateSelectedItems(element, true, false, expectedValues);
628   }
629
630   /**
631    * Validates that the specified items are selected within the given list UI element.
632    *
633    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
634    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
635    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
636    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be selected.
637    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
638    */
639   public T validateSelectedItems(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
640      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that the specified items are selected");
641      return validateSelectedItems(element, true, soft, expectedValues);
642   }
643
644   private T validateSelectedItems(final ListUiElement element, boolean shouldBeSelected, boolean soft,
645                                   final String... expectedValues) {
646      element.before().accept(driver);
647      List<String> selectedItems = itemListService.getSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
648      element.after().accept(driver);
649      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selectedItems);
650
651      if (soft) {
652         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
653               softAssertions -> {
654                  if (shouldBeSelected) {
655                     softAssertions.assertThat(selectedItems).as(VALIDATING_SELECTED_ITEMS)
656                           .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues));
657                  } else {
658                     softAssertions.assertThat(selectedItems).as(VALIDATING_SELECTED_ITEMS)
659                           .doesNotContainAnyElementsOf(Arrays.asList(expectedValues));
660                  }
661               }
662         );
663      } else {
664         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
665               () -> {
666                  if (shouldBeSelected) {
667                     Assertions.assertThat(selectedItems).as(VALIDATING_SELECTED_ITEMS)
668                           .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues));
669                  } else {
670                     Assertions.assertThat(selectedItems).as(VALIDATING_SELECTED_ITEMS)
671                           .doesNotContainAnyElementsOf(Arrays.asList(expectedValues));
672                  }
673               }
674         );
675      }
676   }
677
678   /**
679    * Validates that the specified items are not selected within the given list UI element.
680    *
681    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
682    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should not be selected.
683    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
684    */
685   public T validateNotSelectedItems(final ListUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
686      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that the specified items are not selected");
687      return validateSelectedItems(element, false, false, expectedValues);
688   }
689
690   /**
691    * Validates that the specified items are not selected within the given list UI element.
692    *
693    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
694    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
695    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
696    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should not be selected.
697    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
698    */
699   public T validateNotSelectedItems(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
700      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that the specified items are not selected");
701      return validateSelectedItems(element, false, soft, expectedValues);
702   }
703
704   /**
705    * Retrieves all available items in the list.
706    *
707    * @param element The list UI element.
708    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
709    */
710   public T getAll(final ListUiElement element) {
711      Allure.step("[UI - List] Retrieve all items from the list");
712
713      element.before().accept(driver);
714      List<String> allItems = itemListService.getAll(element.componentType(), element.locator());
715      element.after().accept(driver);
716      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), allItems);
717      return uiServiceFluent;
718   }
719
720   /**
721    * Validates that all expected items are present within the given list UI element.
722    *
723    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
724    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be present in the list.
725    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
726    */
727   public T validateAllItems(final ListUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
728      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that all expected items are present in the list");
729      return validateAllItems(element, false, expectedValues);
730   }
731
732   /**
733    * Validates that all expected items are present within the given list UI element.
734    *
735    * @param element        The {@link ListUiElement} representing the list UI component.
736    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
737    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
738    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be present in the list.
739    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
740    */
741   public T validateAllItems(final ListUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
742      Allure.step("[UI - List] Validate that all expected items are present in the list");
743      element.before().accept(driver);
744      List<String> allItems = itemListService.getSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
745      element.after().accept(driver);
746      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), allItems);
747
748      if (soft) {
749         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
750               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(allItems)
751                     .as("Validating Items").containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
752         );
753      } else {
754         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
755               () -> Assertions.assertThat(allItems)
756                     .as("Validating Items").containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
757         );
758      }
759   }
760
761   /**
762    * Inserts values into the list.
763    *
764    * @param componentType The type of the list component.
765    * @param locator       The locator of the list element.
766    * @param values        The values to insert.
767    */
768   @Override
769   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
770      Allure.step("[UI - List] Insert values into the list");
771      itemListService.insertion(componentType, locator, values);
772   }
773
774}
